content: April 1 Micron Technology Inc reported a marginal rise in quarterly revenue  helped by higher demand for its chips used in personal computers  servers and smartphones.
name: Micron Technology Inc
title: Chipmaker Micron's revenue rises marginally

content: SAN FRANCISCO  Feb 16 The U.S. National Security Agency has figured out how to hide spying software deep within hard drives made by Western Digital  Seagate  Toshiba and other top manufacturers  giving the agency the means to eavesdrop on the majority of the world's computers  according to cyber researchers and former operatives.
name: Micron Technology Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Russian researchers expose breakthrough U.S. spying program

content: SAN FRANCISCO  Feb 16 The U.S. National Security Agency has figured out how to hide spying software deep within hard drives made by Western Digital  Seagate  Toshiba and other top manufacturers  giving the agency the means to eavesdrop on the majority of the world's computers  according to cyber researchers and former operatives.
name: Micron Technology Inc
title: Russian researchers expose breakthrough U.S. spying program

content: SAN FRANCISCO Memory chipmaker Micron Technology gave a quarterly revenue forecast on Tuesday that missed Wall Street's expectations  hurt by an output drop as it upgrades DRAM production lines  and its shares fell.
name: Micron Technology Inc
title: Micron revenue outlook misses Street  stock drops

content: (Adds details and comment from conference call  updates stock move)
name: Micron Technology Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Micron revenue outlook misses Street  stock drops

content: SAN FRANCISCO  Jan 6 Memory chipmaker Micron Technology on Tuesday posted higher fiscal first-quarter revenue that fell a bit short of expectations as a stabilizing personal computer industry supported demand for DRAM chips.
name: Micron Technology Inc
title: Chipmaker Micron posts higher fiscal 1st-quarter revenue
